ModulePrefs.title: Google Election Center app
ModulePrefs.description: Enter your home address to find your voter registration information, voting location and more. Embed this app on your website or blog to help others find this important information.
ModulePrefs.author: Google, Inc.

UserPref.name: prompt
UserPref.default_value: Find your voter information. Enter the *home* address where you are registered to vote:

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">

	var opt = {
		baseUrl: 'http://election-gadgets.googlecode.com/hg/voter-info/',
		gadgetUrl: 'http://election-gadgets.googlecode.com/hg/voter-info/voter-info-frame.xml',
		
		MODULE_ID: __MODULE_ID__,
		BIDI_START_EDGE: '__BIDI_START_EDGE__',
		BIDI_END_EDGE: '__BIDI_END_EDGE__',
		BIDI_DIR: '__BIDI_DIR__',
		BIDI_REVERSE_DIR: '__BIDI_REVERSE_DIR__',
		
		writeScript: function( name, seconds ) {
			document.write(
				'<script type="text/javascript" src="',
					_IG_GetCachedUrl( opt.baseUrl + name, { refreshInterval: seconds || 60 } ),
				'">',
				'<\/script>'
			);
		}
	};
	
	opt.writeScript( 'voter-info.js' );
	
</script>
